property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog." - Director Taiva, to Isabough

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn." - Heroics: A Book of Fables

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Evil is to be unshackled, not slain. Unlock your foe and release the miracle within." - Keevan, docent of Kollema Hall

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matthew G. Lewis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rovina Cai

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We asked for a home and received the world." - Scroll of Nine Blessings

property.name: Artist
property.value: Justin + Alexis Hernandez

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tyrant's bellow of rage trailed off into a whimper as the last of his fortune escaped his grasp." - The Dethroner's Grimoire

property.name: Artist
property.value: Robbie Trevino

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knight Kathryn closed her eyes, bracing herself for the end. When she opened them again, she stood triumphant over her foe." - Thadus the Healer, Memoirs

property.name: Artist
property.value: Justin + Alexis Hernandez

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blademaster turned his fury to his new foes: root rot and cabbage slugs." - Myths and Miracles, Vol. VII

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mark Tedin

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Five suns! Can you even imagine how complicated the orbital calculations must be? What I wouldn't give to tackle an equation like that!" - Zimone, Quandrix mage-student

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Infinite ideas flow through the Multiverse, waiting for an open mind." - The Biblioplex: An Introduction

property.name: Artist
property.value: Justin + Alexis Hernandez

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every Planeswalker remembers the first time their mind touched the staggering vastness of the Multiverse." - Kasmina

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kristina Collantes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One need not know the specific details of a spell to suppress its effect. Simply rearrange the rules of the reality within which the spell operates." - Imbraham, Quandrix dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Olena Richards

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where do our forgotten thoughts go? I knew once, but I can't remember." - Director Taiva, journal entry

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kristina Collantes

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shatter your opponent's spell with enough force, and you'll shatter their confidence with it." - Tome of Obstructions, marginalia

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 1. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wish most often granted is the wish to choose one's own destiny." - Aethershrine, inscription

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kristina Collantes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can offer only information, young one. What path you choose is up to you." - Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios

property.name: Artist
property.value: Robbie Trevino

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Felix

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Chronomancers have a rather different definition of living in the moment." - The Millennium Tome

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm." - Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guilt is not absolution. Regret is not justice. But it is right that you suffer." - Extus Narr

property.name: Artist
property.value: Robbie Trevino

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all Dragon creatures. • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One brother fought for the sake of the Multiverse. The other for himself." - The Elderspell Parable

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Felix

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They distrust my methods, but when they want results, whom do you think they seek?" - Incantations of Lim-Dûl

property.name: Artist
property.value: Robbie Trevino

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Demons prefer to deal with those who believe themselves too wise to be fooled." - Scroll case inscription

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An angel can shine like the sun, inspire the weak, and even threaten victory over darkness. But in the end it matters not, for it still dies like any other pest." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matthew G. Lewis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic brought peace to the Vastlands but was soon corrupted." - The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kristina Collantes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It takes so little energy to erase a person. It's almost like the universe doesn't care that they existed at all." - Extus Narr

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rovina Cai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To dwell within the Blind Eternities is unthinkable. To encounter those who do could shatter the mind." - Chronicle of the Titans

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matthew G. Lewis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's always my brightest students who make the worst decisions." - Shaile, Silverquill dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Benjamin Ee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rovina Cai

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My colleagues revile the barbarity of the Blood Age, but I believe we have much to learn from the magics of endless war." - Embrose, Silverquill dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Matthew G. Lewis

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful when handling old magical trinkets. You never know who they've been." - Augusta, Lorehold dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Will! They have a copy of Tales of the Fae here! Want me to read you a bedtime story?" - Rowan Kenrith

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How did you get your hands on that? Wait, never mind. I don't want to know." - Plargg, Lorehold dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Carly Mazur

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies. Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some mages duel using intricate spellcraft and superior tactics. Others just get really, really mad." - Secrets of the Feradorn Sorcerers

property.name: Artist
property.value: Benjamin Ee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first mages witnessed the fury of the raging storm and wished to answer back." - The Stormwright Texts

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery. Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Artist
property.value: Olena Richards

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To this day, I have no idea if the heavens were obeying him or attacking him." - Ral Zarek, research notes

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thus, Bruk the Skyhammer earned his epithet and won the war, all in one fiery moment." - Compendium of Warspells

property.name: Artist
property.value: Justin + Alexis Hernandez

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the prospect of what could be doesn't electrify you to your core, why attend Strixhaven at all?" - Nassari, Prismari dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) This spell can't be countered. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dominik Mayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Barbara Rosiak

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her quest began as all quests do, with one small step in an unexpected direction." - The Explorer's Testament

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as you are breathing, you always have something more to give." - Valentin, Witherbloom dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kristina Collantes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd be amazed how much a single plant has to teach you." - Lisette, Witherbloom dean

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Felix

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bloody din of invasion faded And silent song rang through the woods again." - "Song of Freyalise"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Carly Mazur

property.name: Rules
property.value: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On a world where time was torn asunder, destruction ruled the minds of all." - Multiversal Metahistories

property.name: Artist
property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is neither cruel nor kind. It operates on necessity, not sentiment." - -Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.value: Olena Richards

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Centuries of war had broken Arcavios, but a single seed began the long process of renewal." - The Mystic Age: A Saga of Spells

property.value: Minttu Hynninen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never reject the kindness of a serpent. It will not be offered twice." - Druidic manuscript fragment

property.value: Anato Finnstark

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Neither blade nor tempest can assail the serenity of a tranquil mind." - The Turrau Carvings

property.value: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

property.value: Multicolor Blue Green

property.value: Multicolor White Red

property.value: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「彼らがあなたの宮殿を荒らそうとするなら、あなたが嵐にならなければなりません。」 - -帝国魔術の手引き

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「罪悪感は赦しではない。後悔は正義ではない。だたし、苦しむことは正しい。」 - -エクスタス・ナー

property.name: Artist
property.value: Maiko Aoji

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all Dragon creatures. • Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「兄弟の一人は多元宇宙のために戦った。もう一人は自分のために。」 ――*古呪の寓話*

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kota Nakatsubo

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「奴らは私の方法を信用していない。しかし成果が必要なとき、奴らが探すの誰だと思う？」 - - リム＝トゥールの決まり文句

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「悪魔は、自分が賢く、騙されることなどないと信じている者を好む。」 ー巻物入れに刻まれた言葉

property.name: Artist
property.value: Sumie Okazu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「天使は太陽のように輝き、弱者を鼓舞し、暗闇を脅かし勝利を手にすることできる。しかし、結局そんなことは重要ではない。それでも最後は他の害虫と同じように死ぬのだから。」 - - オブ・ニクシリス

property.name: Artist
property.value: Rindo Karasuba

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「魔法は大界に平和をもたらしたが、すぐに腐敗した。」 - - 神秘の時代：呪文物語

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「人を消すのにほとんどエネルギーはいらない。稀で宇宙がその存在を全く気にしてないかのようにな。」 - - エクスタス・ナー

property.name: Artist
property.value: Karuta Shiki

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「久遠の闇の中に住むなど考えられない。精神を打ち砕く奴らに遭遇するなど。」 - - タイタン年代記

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yuka Oka

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「最悪の決断をするのは、いつも最も優秀な生徒です。」 - - シルバークイル学部長、シェイル

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kaoru Yukishiro

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yusuke Katekari

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「同僚たちは血の時代の野蛮さを避難しているが、俺は無限に続く戦争の魔法から学べることは多いと思っている。」 - - シルバークイルの学部長、エムブローズ

property.name: Artist
property.value: Hagiya Kaoru

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「古い魔法の小物を扱うときは注意してください。それが以前に何者だったか分かりませんから。」 - -ロアホールドの学部長、オーガスタ

property.name: Artist
property.value: Hisashi Momose

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「ヴィル！フェイの物語があるわ！寝る前に読み聞かせてあげましょうか？」 - -ローアン・ケンリス

property.name: Artist
property.value: Norikatsu Miyoshi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「どうやってそれを手に入れたのだ？ いや、気にするな。答えは聞きたくない。」 - -ロアホールドの学部長、プラーグ

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shiro Yayoi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Hatori Kyoka

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies. Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「複雑な魔術と優れた戦術をもって決闘する魔道士もいる。一方で、とにかく怒りに任せるだけの魔道士もいる。」 - -フェラドルンの魔術師の秘密

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yangyang + Xiaji

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「最初の魔術師は荒れ狂う嵐の怒りを目撃し、それに応えようとした。」 - -嵐大工の文書

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery. Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Artist
property.value: Hiro Suda

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「今もなお、天は彼に従っていたのか、彼を攻撃していたのか、私にはわからない。」 - -ラル・ザレックの研究記録

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「こうして、空槌のブルクはその燃える一瞬で称号と勝利の両方を手にした。」 - -戦呪文撮要

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「何ができるかという可能性に心が揺さぶられないなら、なぜストリクスヘイヴンに来たのか？」 - -プリズマリの学部長、ナサーリ

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ayako Ishiguro

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.) This spell can't be countered. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Maiko Aoji

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yuka Sakuma

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「彼女の探検は、すべての探検と同様に、予期せぬ方向への小さな一步から始まった。」 - -探検者の遺言

property.name: Artist
property.value: Sakura Tomo

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「呼吸しているかぎり、お前にはまだ貢献できるものがある。」 - -ウィザーブルームの学部長、ヴァレンティン

property.name: Artist
property.value: Shie Nanahara

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「たったひとつの植物が教えてくれることの多さに驚くと思います。」 ――ウィザーブルームの学部長、リセッテ

property.name: Artist
property.value: Uichi Ukumo

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「侵略の血まみれの喧騒が消え そして再び静かな歌が森の中に鳴り響く。」 - -「フレイアリーズの歌」

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yuka Sakuma

property.name: Rules
property.value: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「時がばらばらに引き裂かれた世界では、破壊がすべての心を支配した。」 - -多元宇宙の形而上史学

property.name: Artist
property.value: Norikatsu Miyoshi

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「自然は残酷でも親切でもない。感情ではなく、必要性に応じて機能するのよ。」 ――ウィザーブルームの魔道生徒、ダイナ

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ayami Nakashima

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「何世紀も続く競争がアルケヴィオスを破壊した。しかしひとつの種が、長い再生の道を歩み始めた。」 - -神秘の時代：呪文物語

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「大蛇の親切は決して拒否してはならない。それは二度と施されることがないのだから。」 - -ドルイドの写本の欠片

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yuhki Takeuchi

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 3 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「刃も嵐も、穏やかな心の静けさを攻撃することはできない。」 - -ターラウの彫刻

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Black

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「屈辱を受けてすべての力を失った暴君の話？ それだけで刺激的だよ！」 - - シルバークイルの魔道生徒、キリアン

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor Blue Red

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「水圧式パワーグリップは失敗だったが、その電手は大きな成功だった。」 - -首席イズマグナスの日誌

property.name: Artist
property.value: Hatori Kyoka

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor Blue Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「たったひとつのシダの渦から、今まで読んだどんな本よりも深い洞察を得ました。」 - -クアンドリクスの学部長、キアン

property.name: Artist
property.value: Karuta Shiki

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Red

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「血の時代の魔術師は、敵に雷雨の降らせていたという。我々もその技を模倣できるはずだ。」 - -ロアホールドの魔道生徒、ドラディエル

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor Black Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 「王から肥料に、できるだけ早く。」 - -退位させる者のグリモワール

property.name: Artist
property.value: Magane Okuda
